alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 8:14AM PST until December 30 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations a half an inch to 3 inches and ice accumulations one tenth of an inch or less. * WHERE...Moses Lake, Ephrata, Quincy, and Othello. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light snow will occur this afternoon and evening with very minor accumulations. The more impactful snow will come late this evening through early Friday morning. The freezing rain potential is for areas along I-90 and southward, especially towards Mattawa, Royal City.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
